detaileddescription.para: This file contains the implementation for parsing event types from string identifiers. It defines a function parseEventType which maps string identifiers to their corresponding event types as defined in the EventType enumeration.

listitem.para: parseEventType(const std::string& eventIdentifier) This function takes a string identifier as an argument and returns the corresponding EventType enumeration value. It makes use of the eventIdentifierMap to look up the corresponding event type. If the identifier is not found in the map, it will throw an exception.
"Event.hpp" for EventType enumeration and eventIdentifierMap declaration.
